ntfHistoryAlarm.message: Alarm time is set in history!</br>Maybe change date?
ntfHistoryAlarm.description: Popup notify text for alarm that is set in 'history'

optHintSaving.message: * options are saved as soon as they are changed

optHintPlaying.message: * you can always press play and listen to selected tone with selected volume

optHintSnoozing.message: * when 'alarm stop after' time expires alarm will be snoozed for inputted duration

insSCRText1.message: Small popup application that will always be within a reach. When opened it takes little place and all features are within few clicks. If there are no alarms, new alarm form is opened automatically! </br> In footer are 'Instructions' and 'Options' links that will open section for configuration at any time.

insSCRText2.message: You can choose between creating one-time alarm or repetitive alarm that will trigger at same time at every day you select!</br>Alarm can be created by setting its time and date and pressing 'Confirm' button!</br>By simply creating your few alarms that will be your reminders, you are good to go!

insERAlarmsText1.message: Editing is easy! Navigate to options of alarm and press 'Edit' button. That will open editing form where if you press 'Confirm' alarm will be changed!

insERAlarmsText2.message: Picking a date for calendar was never easier! Simply navigate through days, months, maybe even years!

insERAlarmsText3.message: When popup is opened, alarms are listed one after another. By simply opening options and pressing 'Remove' button, alarm will be deleted.

insNotifText.message: Notifications are raised when alarm is due, and are shown in bottom right corner of your main display.</br>While notification is up, sound selected in configuration (Options page) will play.</br>Alarm is also possible to cancel from popup! Instead of 'delete', there will be offered 'cancel'!

suppAboutText.message: This is lightweight, simple and user-friendly extension for Google Chrome that extremely easy to install and use! Its main purpose is to give users alarms/notifications that they can use with only few clicks, anywhere, for every device (with chrome).</br>Extension was created out of authors personal need for something like this and therefore is not profitable or gains income in any way.

suppLibText1.message: A lightweight and powerful datetime-picker that is used to easily manipulate date and time of alarm.

suppLibText2.message: Additional functionality on top of a select HTML element. Extends to some cool behavior!

suppLibText3.message: What else to say beside that is add awesomeness to the app!

suppSupportText.message: If you find any errors or have some suggestion for improvement do not hesitate to contact author! </br> And of course, if you like it, rate it in store so others can also enjoy this app. :)
